cheatsheet.title: Creating the Users and Departments in the Portal

intro.description: This cheat sheet will guide you through the steps of creating departments in the Portal.

item.title: Create the Users
item.description:
First create the users:
1. Login with the default motu/motu password.
2. Switch to the Participant Management View of the Administration Perspective.
3. Click the Create icon in the All Users section.
4. Create two users User1 and User2.

item.title: Create the Departments
item.description:
Now create the departments:
1. In case of not already done, switch to the Participant Management view.
2. Right-click the NationalDivision organization and choose Create Department.
3. Create two departments, e.g. USA and Germany.

item.title: Associate the Users with Departments
item.description:
To associate users with departments, drag and drop them from the All Users section to the according department in the Participant Tree.
1. Assign User1 to the HeadOffice role.
2. Assign User1 to the NationalDirector role in the department USA.
3. Assign User2 to the NationalDirector role in the department Germany.
